mapper.select: CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( `id` bigint(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'ID', `machineCode` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备号（安卓为IMEI，iOS为IDFV）', `specCode` varchar(60) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '特别码（安卓为安卓id，ios为推送设备号）', `mobile` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '手机号', `privacyVersion` varchar(300) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '隐私协议版本', `mobileTime` datetime NOT NULL COMMENT '签署时手机时间', `machineTime` bigint(20) NOT NULL COMMENT '签署时机器时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='信e投隐私协议签署记录';
mapper.insert: insert into user ( nickname, birthday, password, sex )values( #{user.nickname}, #{user.birthday}, #{user.password}, #{user.sex} )
